attributes.action: follow australias lead-stop immigration,saving aussie jobs for aussies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: australia just announced plans to curb-stop immigration in an effort to save aussie jobs for their own people,gordon brown has to follow this lead to protect the indiginous population of this small island.some will say its too late,we know the primeminister is blind to the over-whelming number of foreigners already here and those waiting on the other side of the channel, hoping to illegally enter this country,but something has to be done NOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
